mapper.sql: server_order_id, czb_vehicle_clean_order.user_id,user_account,czb_clean_server_vehicle.user_name,vehicle_color,vehicle_type,vehicle_series,rider_name,contact_number, czb_vehicle_clean_order.rider_id, third_order, pay_status, actual_price, czb_vehicle_clean_order.vehicle_id,license_number, process_status, cancel_time, cancel_person_id, cancel_reason, czb_vehicle_clean_order.create_at, czb_vehicle_clean_order.update_at
mapper.select:
select
from czb_vehicle_clean_order LEFT JOIN czb_user ON czb_vehicle_clean_order.user_id = czb_user.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_clean_server_vehicle ON czb_vehicle_clean_order.vehicle_id = czb_clean_server_vehicle.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN czb_clean_rider ON czb_vehicle_clean_order.rider_id = czb_clean_rider.rider_id where czb_vehicle_clean_order.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (process_status = 1 OR process_status = 0 ) ORDER BY czb_vehicle_clean_order.create_at DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into czb_vehicle_clean_order (server_order_id, user_id, rider_id, third_order, pay_status, actual_price, vehicle_id, process_status, cancel_time, cancel_person_id, cancel_reason, create_at, update_at,server_id) values (#{serverOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(),#{serverId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
